name: Lumi (DrD, ObliiViioN)
description:
Lumi

Hey this is our game in 3 hours.

Controls

Cause i couldn't make a tutorial cause game Dev is hard

Restart Level - R

Move- A & D

Jump- Space

Take out fire - Right Click

Throw Fire - Left click (will shoot based on last movement direction)

Fires

Light - #1 key

Heat - #2 key

Damage - #3 key

Info

All fire is in limited quantities so use wisely. You may need to restart the level (r) if you run out. You can see your health(top red bar)  and the fuel left (light, heat and damage bars) on the screen.

Light fire will light your way and will light crystals.

Crystals will open blue doors giving you access to other areas.

Heat fire will warm you up and allow u to stand on Ice. Ice will hurt you without heat.

Damage fire destroys ice however hurts you as well.

Try to get to the wooden door to advance to the next level.

We know its not a lot of levels but 3 hours is hard. Enjoy!

This was your first game jam but a lot of fun.
